title: Marnie Simpson dreams of pre-pregnancy body as she flashes boobs in sheer jumpsuit
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Frustrated Marnie Simpson is already dreaming of getting her pre-pregnancy body back.

The heavily pregnant star is still waiting on the arrival of her baby son, as she's exceeded her due date of last week.

And now Marnie, 27, is "tired" and "fed up" of being pregnant, admitting she's forgotten what her body looked like before she began carrying her little one.

The mum-to-be shared a sizzling throwback snap in a completely see-through floral jumpsuit, which showed off her surgically-enhanced cleavage, and tiny waist.

The jumpsuit had ruffles on the sleeves and legs, to add a girly touch.

(Image: Instagram)

She admitted she was "day dreaming" of her old body and what it felt like to not be pregnant.

Marnie also paid her respects to other pregnant women, confessing she knows it isn't easy.

"Day dreaming of what it felt like to not be pregnant! Really didn't think it would get to this stage but I'm honestly so tired and fed up and just want to have my baby now!" she captioned the stunning photo.

(Image: Instagram)

She praised: "How woman do pregnancy 4/5 times I'll never know I have a great amount of respect for women as I now know it's not easy!

"Hoping I’ll get this body back sometime in the near future but for now here is a TB picture of my waist as I’ve forgot what it looks like".

She has recently documented the struggles during her pregnancy, including her two stone weight gain.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The Geordie Shore star confessed it has been impossible for her to feel sexy, but is doing her best to get there in racy outfits.

In recent weeks, she has also opened up about how pregnancy has left her feeling insecure about her body.

(Image: Instagram)

She wrote in a previous post: "Can't believe I'm almost there, pregnancy has been a experience. Watching my body change has been challenging to say the least.

"Not going to lie, I've started to develop some stretch marks and water retention leaving me with a hell more cellulite than usual which is daunting but I know it's going to be so worth it regardless when I see my baby boy."

Marnie is expecting her first child with boyfriend Casey Johnson, 24, and it's due any day now.
description: The heavily pregnant mum-to-be wants her pre-pregnancy body back already as she's overdue
